sub_title: Government Relations Specialist | China Expert | International Affairs and Project Management
summary: Accomplished government relations professional with a decade of experience in China. Expertise in advocacy, intelligence, relationship building, and project management. Bilingual in Mandarin and English. Views are my own, and do not necessarily represent those of any organisations for which I work or am otherwise affiliated.
